GSD.description:
net: sfp: fix memory leak in sfp_probe()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.207 by commit ede990cfc42775bd0141e21f37ee365dcaeeb50f. For more details please see the references link.
